questions.text: Which member of the Senior Staff was with Charlie when Zoey was kidnapped?
questions.explanation:
Josh & Lyman & Josh Lyman.

	Josh was trying to keep Charlie from looking for Zoey in his car. Once when Josh got in Charlie's face, Charlie shoved him away.

Yes.

	Jean-Paul gave Zoey GHB, a derivative of ecstasy.

questions.text: Who found the fax picture of Zoey?
questions.explanation:
Donna.

	Donna was going through faxes when she found the picture and note from Zoey's captors.

questions.text: Wes said to ____________: "You are the key witness to the end of the world."
questions.explanation:
Jean-Paul.

	Wes made this quote when he was checking Jean-Paul's eyes.

questions.text: Toby: "I wouldn't be surprised if __________ and ________ aren't shut down."
questions.explanation:
Pennsylvania, Connecticut.

	Toby was saying this to the gang when he finally made it to the White House from the hospital.

questions.text: Who told CJ that Zoey's kidnapping would be the biggest press conference of her life?
questions.explanation:
Leo.

	CJ just stared at him.

questions.text: Toby said he would drop napalm on Yellowstone to keep his kids safe.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Toby told the gang this when he met them in the portico.

Speaker of the House.

	The Speaker of the House steps forward to take the President's place when there is no Vice President to take over.

questions.text: Who told Leo that stepping down would be a courageous thing for a father to do?
questions.explanation:
Will.

	They were discussing the President stepping down.

Yes.

	President Bartlet left the Oval Office as an ending to the fourth season of 'The West Wing'. I hope you enjoyed the fourth season quizzes of 'The West Wing'.
